attachments.displayName:
KNOWING-JESUS Daily Devotional
Where is Your Trust?
Believe in the Lord Jesus Christ, and you will be saved. Acts 16:31 ..Anyone who believes in Him is not condemned, but anyone who does not believe on Him is already condemned, because he has not believed in the name of the One and Only Son of God. John 3:18

Continue Reading Today's Daily Devotional HERE
http://www.knowing-jesus.com/where-is-your-trust/
